org.pojava.persistence.serial
Class XmlDefs

java.lang.Object
  org.pojava.persistence.serial.XmlDefs

public class XmlDefs
extends java.lang.Object

XmlDefs holds configuration settings for serialization.

Author:
John Pile

register

public java.lang.Integer register(java.lang.Object obj)
 Null = Serialize
    0 = getReferenceId
   1+ = referenceId

Parameters:
obj -
Returns:
null if serializing, 0 if needing reference ID, or 1+ if providing reference ID
